H

HIGH_PRIORITY - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailCreationQueue
a constant to indicate a high priority
HelpAboutJMenuItem - Variable in class jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar
Menu item that allows the user to see application information.
HelpJMenu - Variable in class jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar
The Help menu which is part of the JMenuBar for the Jpo application.
HelpLicenseJMenuItem - Variable in class jpo.ApplicationJMenuBar
Menu item that allows the user to see the license.
Highres_Name - Variable in class jpo.PictureInfo
The full path to the high resolution version of the picture.
HtmlDistillerJFrame - class jpo.HtmlDistillerJFrame.
A GUI for the HtmlDistiller.
HtmlDistillerJFrame(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.HtmlDistillerJFrame
Constructor to create the GUI.
HtmlDistillerThread - class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.
This thread object generates a web of html pages that allows you to browse groups of pictures using a web browsers.
HtmlDistillerThread(File, int, int, int, int, int, int, boolean, boolean, float, SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode, boolean, String) - Constructor for class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread
Creates and starts a Thread that writes the picture nodes from the specified startNode to the target directory.
HtmlDistillerThread.ButtonListener - class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.ButtonListener.
A button listener for the cancel button on the progress frame.
HtmlDistillerThread.ButtonListener() - Constructor for class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.ButtonListener
 
HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer - class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer.
Inner class that keeps a buffer of the picture descriptions and will output a table row with the buffered descriptions when the buffer has reached it's limit.
HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer(int, BufferedWriter) - Constructor for class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
Creates a Description buffer with the indicated number of columns.
hasNoListeners() - Method in class jpo.SourcePicture
method that says whether there are any listeners attached to this object
hasPictures(File) - Static method in class jpo.Tools
This method looks into the supplied subdirectory and tries to see if there is at least one picture in it for which our Java Environment has a decoder.
highresChooser() - Method in class jpo.PictureInfoEditor
method that brings up a JFileChooser and places the path of the file selected into the JTextField of the highres locations
highresErrorJLabel - Variable in class jpo.PictureInfoEditor
An informative message about what sort of error we have if any on the highres image
highresLocationChanged - Variable in class jpo.PictureInfoChangeEvent
indicates whether the highresLocation was changed.
highresLocationJButton - Variable in class jpo.PictureInfoEditor
Button to change the location of the image file
highresLocationJTextField - Variable in class jpo.PictureInfoEditor
The location of the image file
highresLocationJTextField - Variable in class jpo.ThumbnailDescriptionJPanel
The location of the image file
highresTargetDir - Variable in class jpo.JarDistillerThread
highres picture directory if pictures need to be copied
highresTargetDir - Variable in class jpo.XmlDistiller
highres picture directory if pictures need to be copied
horizontalPadding - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailJScrollPane
The amount of horizontal padding between the thumbnails and descriptions.
htmlDirectory - Variable in class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread
The directory into which the web page will be generated.
